1.content: Well, it seems like you're looking to find a new job. Or maybe you want to observe what jobs would be like in a world of giants and tinies? Well, whatever the case, there's only one thing to do now: select an option.
1.title: Career Path

choices: A tiny gets a job as a police officer
A tiny criminal is captured and interrogated by giant police officers
11.content: The life of a cop isn't easy... but it's even worse in a world with drastically different sizes. What's the scenario?
11.title: Police Force

choices: A tiny visits a giant strip club
A tiny gets a job at a strip club for giants
12.content: What kind of naughty situation will happen here?
12.title: Strip Club

121.content:
You were nervous to visit a giant gay strip club... it was something you'd always wanted to try, but you were too scared to go through with it. You knew that giant strippers loved tiny men, you'd heard from your friends how they strive to make their tiny customers feel good.

You decided to try it out, walking into the giant club you immediately noticed two strippers that you were fond of... one of which noticed you and began to walk your way.

Who was it?

Michael

http://imgur.com/a/O1Jjkw9

Dom

121.title: A tiny visits a giant strip club

choices: Slipped you into his armpit while teasing you
1211.content:
You saw the giant cowboy themed stripper walk towards you, his giant boots clicking on the floor.

"Howdy there, little fella. Name's Michael." He winked at you.

You were speechless as you looked up at the giant man, his pecs were like mountains and his uncovered arms were muscular. Not to mention his bulge that his speedo barely covered.

"Heh, first time here huh?" Michael reached down and scooped you up before bringing you up to his face "Don't you worry, I'll make you feel reaaaaaal good tonight cutie."

You blushed as Michael smirked.

"I... uh"

Michael pressed you up against his pecs, you sank into the crevice between the hot muscles.

"Mmh, how about we go somewhere more comfortable?" He flexed his pecs for you before walking over to a couch in the center of the club and propping his booted feet up on a table.

What did he do next?

You blushed at the deep voice and massive muscular body looming above. Dom knew how to make others feel small, well smaller. Nodding your head you were soon scooped up into Dom's warm palm, as he stood up the stripper held you before his buff chest.

"That's it boy, let commander make you feel good and i can let ya off with a warning~", Dom smirked as he bounced his huge pecs, letting drops of b.o sweat trail out of the huge man's muscles.

Dom hummed tapping his chin while smugly smiling. "I don't a cell with me so I'm gonna need to improvise. Luckily for me I've got plenty of holding cells shortie."

You heated up as Dom....
1212.title: Dom

122.content:
After highschool life wasn't on your side. You had a track record of bad grades and paying for college for a definite NO. A job advertisement caught your attention as it was for a opening at a new strip club, specifically for a tiny like you.

The only requirement was being a tiny, and you were almost immediately hired on the spot. A giant stripper with years of experience helped you get used to the job. While you couldn't pleasure others like regular strippers, you played the role of a toy. You explored and worshipped the muscles, got smooshed beneath feet, and got crushed by butts and dicks.

Sometimes you would do roleplay with giant strippers while your client watched.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Today you would be partnered with a giant stripper. You would do your routine of acting as a toy and being dominated by the stripper and put on a show for your client.

You sat on a table while your client, a middle age man sat on the couch in your private room. The man seem to get impatient but you smiled as your partner for today's roleplay opened the door.

"Alright sir, let me show you how tiny I am~", you spoke licking your lips as you turned to the shadow covering you.

Who was your partner today?
Dai and Aiden
( https://i.pinimg.com/originals/9f/c0/11/... )
These two are lovers who swam competitively in thier free time. Their very friendly but adopt a sexy attitude when working. Your roleplay with them involves being pressed between their muscles and dicks as they make love.

Antonio
( https://i.pinimg.com/236x/ef/01/bb/ef01b... )
This Spanish fellow usually does body worship roleplay, having you walk all over his skin and worship his muscled physique.

Stan
( https://www.deviantart.com/suyohara/art/... )
Stan is the most dominating over you. He smears you over his muscles and sits on you while treating you like a bug. His roleplaying was grest.

Who was your partner?
122.title: A tiny gets a job at a strip club for giants

1223.content:
Stan scowled at you, his tight speedo outlined his bulging erection.

"What a pathetic runt... I'll show you what a REAL man looks like." He turned around to show his massive butt being squeezed by his speedo.

"W-What? Please don't sit on me!" You 'begged' for mercy.

"I don't understand bugs, I'll have you trapped under my ass, grinding you underneath it until you surrender to me." Stan licked his lips and began to lower his butt.

"No! Stop!!" You continued your routine as the butt came closer and closer.

"Hmmm... should I take my speedo off and make this more interesting?" Stan asked the client.
1223.title: Stan

choices: A tiny gets a desk job
A giant office worker has to research tinies for a report... by capturing one
13.content: Office work is such a bore... unless there are giant men around. What does the next workday entail?
13.title: Office Work

choices: Shirou your buff, middle age coworker,.k
Kai and Brandon two snobby higher ups
131.content:
You ended up getting a desk job at a buisness corporation. There were very little tiny workers, so no accommodations were made for you once you started work. It took you half an hour just to finish one document as you had to run around the keyboard to type.

Your row of fellow desk workers were for the most part pleasant. Some were in thier 30's with a stuble and clothes filled with a large build while others looked to be in college and have athletic forms. There were cases where you almost got stepped on, but they were due to obliviousness and you always recieved an apology.

The major downside and fear of being a tiny at this office job were the workers known as the higher ups. As their name suggests these men are in promoted positions, more wealthy, and loved to show it. You and others dressed causally while the highers wore expensive suits and shoes.

Being a tiny made you more of a target to the higher ups. They always sneer down at you and stomped too close for comfort or held thier loafers over you while comparing you to a insect.

One time a messenger brought you to a higher up's office and set you on the guest seat. The suited man then walked in and acted as if he couldn't see you and sat on you, smashing you under his bubble butt for ten minutes. After getting up he gave an apology that you knew was fake as he held a satisfied smirk.

Today you decided to head to the break room, dodging numerous shoes close to flattening you. You soon bumped into the material of a shoe and were engulfed in a shadow.

Looking up you saw....a
131.title: A tiny gets a desk job

choices: A tiny gets a personal trainer
A tiny gets a job as a personal trainer, helping giant men get buffer
14.content: Sometimes tinies need giants to help them get fit. What kind of trials will these bite-sized men go through for a little extra muscle?
14.title: Personal Trainer

choices: You are a teacher with a personal student
You work at a gym for giants
143.content: Here are some more tiny positions for this work out for giants.
143.title: Something else

1431.content:
Being a tiny in the world of fitness was tough. You had trained and study exercises for years. A talent of yours were analyzing the growth of muscles by climbing them and going in between to feel thier strength. Not many took you as thier teacher though, often laughing that a bug wanted to train them.

One did however, his name was Naito.

( https://i.pinimg.com/originals/53/a3/9f/... )

Unlike other other people training who passed your size off as a weakness, Naito wanted you as his teacher dur to your exercise plan. The boy had a serious attitude and desired to become stronger and actually begged to be taught.

The boy was respectful and didn't treat you as less due your size. He apologized for the simplest of things and trained all day. Truth be told, you acted kind of like a father to him as he lived alone and seem to brighten up when coming to a teaching session.

"Now then......

Speaking of, from where you sat on your mailbox you saw the giant pale body jogging towards you wearing only black gym shorts and sneakers. Naito's muscles flexed and dripped sweat as he breathed heavily. Towering over you now, Naito looked over his pecs at you ss he catched his breath.

"Did...I beat my time sensei?"

You smiled and nodded. "Yep ten seconds earlier."

Naito let out a relieved breath as his muscles relaxed and he ran a hand through his orange hair.

"Now then~
1431.title: Tiny Sensei, Big Student

15.content: So, none of those worked out? Try these on for size.

choices: A Tiny investigator looking into the disappearance of both Tinies and Giants

1532.title: Investigator

choices: Ignore Dennis and gets back to work
15321.content:
Your name is William Porter a half an inch tall tiny investigator you were given the task to investigate the whereabouts of the missing tinies and giants. Due to William Porter's very miniature height, he was forced to work with a partner who goes by the name Dennis Powell. Dennis is 6ft 2 inches tall easily looming over his tiny partner who he sometimes mistakes for a speck of dust or a tiny bug. Dennis also had a very muscular build with a slight stubble on his strong jaw. He often comes to work wearing a tight white shirt to showcase his bulging muscles and his large pecs with a black jacket over it. Along with a pair of tight dress pants that looks like it can break at any moment due to his massive bubble butt. Other than that he does accessories himself with a golden chain necklace and a watch along with earrings. Making him seem as if he was the boss of the organization but instead, he's just a very fashionable investigator wanting to learn more from his tiny partner who he heard have solved multiple cases before with such ease.

Today was like no other as he looms over his miniature partner with ease causing William to look up. Due to the massive difference and the size of Dennis's pecs. William had a hard time seeing his giant partner's face and just went back to his work. "Aye William I brought us some coffee and some treats from the bakery across the street" spoke Dennis in his usual deep voice. With no further warning he began lower the coffee he had in the hand down on the table and little did he know it was right over where William is at.

"Holy Crap" shouted William as he jumped out the way of the gigantic cup of coffee that almost crushed him. "I told him countless time to watch what he's doing" spoke William as he watches Dennis walk around the desk and sits ontop of the seat, William shivered remembering the last time it happened. He was knocked over the table right on the seat and due to his tiny size Dennis didn't see him when he sat down right on top of him. Even when William squirmed Dennis felt nothing and it wasn't till when Dennis got home is when he finally discovered William stuck between his buttcheeks.

William snaps back to the present as he heard Dennis unwrapping one of the muffins and began eating it.

What does William do?
15321.title: A Tiny investigator looking into the disappeara...

choices: Run and Leap Off the Muffin and land somewhere on Dennis
He was unable to plan quick enough and ends up getting eaten
153211.content:
William decided it was best to get Dennis’s opinion on this case but right before he could do anything the paper he was currently sitting on began to rise as Dennis picks it up to read causing William fall backward landing directly on top of the massive half eaten muffin. “Gosh darn” spoke William as he rubs his head and looks at his surroundings.noticing he currently lies on top of the muffin Dennis is eating. Before William could do anything more the muffin begin to rise as Dennis goes to take another bite of the muffin completely oblivious to his miniature partner.
Willian started to run as he plans his next move.
153211.title: Tries to Contact Dennis

info.brief_description: In a world where giants exist with tiny people, lots of new jobs have opened up...
info.description:
With the economy booming, hundreds of jobs are now available for both giants and tinies. Choose your career path and see what kind of situations you will get into in the workplace.

Rules

Male interaction only.

Depending on the options you choose, you can either have a first person or a third person POV, but don't do both for one option.

All fetishes allowed except for scat.
